question.name: d0
question.notes: The agency or department typically responsible for handling the issue

label.name: Service Interruption
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around a lack of the power service for any reason other than lack of bill payment

label.name: Turn On Request
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around a request to reinstate the power asset service after a period when it has been off by request

label.name: Power Asset Issue
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around usability (with the exception of an outage), damage or displacement of a power asset other than a power meter, a power line or a transformer

label.name: Shutoff Request
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around a citizen requesting temporary or permanent discontinuation of the power asset

label.name: Transformer Issue
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around problems with power transformers

label.name: Service Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around work having been done on the power asset that was either unsatisfactory, incomplete, or caused other damage to the either the power asset or another asset

label.name: Wires
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around hazards posed by exposed or displaced wires

label.name: Meter Issue
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around usability, damage or displacement of a power (electric) meter

label.name: Service Request
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around work a citizen is asking the city to perform that related to the power asset

label.name: Service Disconnected
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around a lack of power service for reasons related to bill payment or lack thereof

label.name: Question
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around citizens requesting information about the streets asset

label.name: Walkway Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around issues with the curb and sidewalk system

label.name: FYI
label.definition: Description whose central theme is the report of seemingly meaningless information that isn't actionable for the city in real-time, as it relates to streets

label.name: Metal Plate Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around issues with metal plates that have been placed in the street to smooth surfaces or block holes

label.name: Pothole
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around the loss of integrity of the streets system which has resulted in holes

label.name: Street Sweeping
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around street sweeping. Can include anything from complaints to requests

label.name: Crash Barrier Request
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around requests for repair or placement of guardrails, pylons, water barrels or other crash barriers

label.name: Street Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around reports of problems with the integrity or structure of the street system. While there is a specific Pothole label pair, anything that is referencing a large number of potholes that are weakening the overall integrity of the road fall into this label pair.

label.name: Service Request
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around work a citizen is asking the city to perform that related to the streets asset

label.name: Delineators
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around objects whose purpose is to identify and/or block certain locations, paths or other objects

label.name: Service Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around work that has been done on the streets asset that was either unsatisfactory, incomplete or caused other damage to either the streets asset or another asset

label.name: Crash Barrier Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around damage to or complaints about guardrails, pylons, water barrels or other crash barriers

label.name: Painting
label.definition: Descriptions whose central theme is related to painting that needs to be done for roads or for painting that was done but either was incorrectly done or not fully completed.

label.name: Snow and Ice
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around snow or ice conditions in the street system

label.name: Sewer Blockage
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around lack of drainage or overflowing that is specific to the sewer asset

label.name: Manhole Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around any issues with manholes with the exception of damage that is identifiable as a Cave-In at the manhole site

label.name: Service Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around work having been done on the sewer asset that was either unsatisfactory, incomplete, or caused other damage to either the sewer asset or another asset

label.name: Septic Tank Issue
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around problems with a septic tanks system

label.name: Odor Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around citizens reporting smells that are indicative of issues with the sewer asset

label.name: Pump Issue
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around issues with the sewer pumps

label.name: Service Request
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around work a citizen is asking the city to perform that related to the sewer asset

label.name: Administration
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around requiring some sort of help or consultation with a particular individual. Other broad categorization of "administrative help" fall into this label pair as well. All should be related to the sewer assert

label.name: Alarm
label.definition: Descriptions whose central theme is around an alarm of some sort going off.

label.name: Question
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around citizens requesting information about the sewer asset

label.name: Pump Station Issue
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around problems with or failure of the sewer pump station

label.name: Animal Violation
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around violations of leash laws, noise ordinances, or welfare rights regarding animals

label.name: Illegal Dumping
label.definition: Description whose central theme is related to dumping garbage waste where it does not belong

label.name: Estate Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is related to complaints about personal property conditions, typically that are violating building codes or property regulations.

label.name: Noise Violation
label.definition: Description whose central theme is related to either extremely loud, disruptive noise or noise that is occurring during regulated hours

label.name: Permits
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around either calling to request a permit to complete some form of construction or building project.Examples

label.name: Abandoned Vehicle
label.definition: Description whose central theme is related to vehicles (of any sort) that have been abandoned for a prolonged amount of time in a public location

label.name: Construction Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around damage or disturbance to citizens caused by explicit construction and/or land development projects. Projects can be performed by industrial, personal, or municipality actors

label.name: ROW Violation
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around blockage of or improper usage of the right-of-way

label.name: Parking Violation
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around vehicles in areas that are not designated for parking or vehicles that have been ticketed for parking in such areas with citizens calling to contest

label.name: Question
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around citizens calling in to question anything about code enforcement in general, specifically in cases where the question is mimicking a report of a violation or the perception of a violation

label.name: Service Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around complaints about code enforcement staff performing their duties

label.name: Painting Violation
label.definition: Description whose central theme is related to painting structures or areas that should not be painted

label.name: ADA Compliance
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around violations to lack of compliance with the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA)

label.name: Health Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is centered around code violations that could result in physical or mental harm to the citizen or other citizens

label.name: Social Distancing Violation
label.definition: Description whose central theme is related to violations of the social distancing mandate for Covid-19

label.name: Zoning Violation
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around any improper use of land or buildings in a municipality

label.name: Vehicle Maintenance
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around city vehicles requiring maintenance

label.name: Vaccinations
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around the topic of vaccination information

label.name: Social Distancing Violation
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around companies or individuals not complying with COVID-19 measures

label.name: Chemical Discharge
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around chemicals being dumped or leaking from solid waste collection trucks in some location but without mention of the chemicals making their way into the drainage system.

label.name: Request Canceled
label.definition: Descriptions whose central theme is around canceling a request for trash pickup

label.name: Collection Request
label.definition: Description whose central theme is a new request for citizen-generated garbage to be picked up. Requests that include complaints about a previously missed trash collection are excluded here

label.name: Missed Collection
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around trash pickup not being completed

label.name: Question
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around citizens requesting information about the waste collection asset

label.name: Container Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around problems with or requests for trash or recycling receptacles

label.name: Service Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around waste collection or work having been done during waste collection that was either unsatisfactory, incomplete, or caused other damage to the containers or another asset

label.name: Chemical Discharge
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around chemicals being dumped or leaking in some location but WITHOUT mention of the chemicals making their way into the drainage system. This excludes cases of chemicals leaking from solid waste collection trucks

label.name: Bodily Fluids
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around the occurrence of human or animal bodily fluids in public places

label.name: Chemical Disposal
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around citizens who want information on responsible disposal of their chemical waste

label.name: Sharps
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around the observance of medical waste in the form of hypodermic needles in public places

label.name: Odor Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around citizens reporting smells that are indicative of issues that would require hazmat response.

label.name: Chemical Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around harmful chemicals in locations where they do not belong but that are not leaking into the environment

label.name: Question
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around questions about court proceedings

label.name: FYI
label.definition: Description whose central theme is the report of seemingly meaningless information that isn't actionable for the city in real time

label.name: Service Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around work done by the city that was unsatisfactory in some manner and that is not explicitly related to another city asset

label.name: Emergency Barricade
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around the need for a barricade immediately in order to prevent harm or damage

label.name: Unusable Description
label.definition: Description without any clear central theme that aligns with an actionable label pair

label.name: Request Canceled
label.definition: Description whose central theme is related to the cancellation of a report that was previously given or a request that was previously made

label.name: Retrieval Request
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around a situation where an item was lost in a municipality system and the caller is in need of the city to assist in acquiring it

label.name: Fence Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around complaints about fence integrity, absence, or maintenance on property owned by the municipality

label.name: Wires
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around hazards posed by exposed or displaced wires

label.name: Erosion
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around the washing away or absence of topsoil or a similar material due to causes other than weather patterns

label.name: Tree Request
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around requests for service related to trees other than removal of a fallen tree or service to a tree than is tangled in wires

label.name: Banner Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around some sort of hanging decoration or banner, typically that has fallen in the road or is in violation of permissions.

label.name: Question
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around miscellaneous questions that do not fit well into other asset question label pairs as they are written

label.name: Alarm
label.definition: Descriptions whose central theme is around an alarm of some sort going off.

label.name: IT Request
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around requesting some technical service or addition of a webpage or features to an existing webpage or app. Typically reported by city staff or citizens interacting with the city's website

label.name: IT Issue
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around problems with technical systems, typically reported by city staff or citizens interacting with city websites

label.name: Landslide
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around the movement of large amounts of substrate material in locations where it should not be

label.name: Downed Tree
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around a tree that has fallen and is obstructing normal activity or posing a threat

label.name: Dead Animal
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around a dead animal that needs to be picked up

label.name: Downed Pole
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around notification of poles that have/are falling but that do not have additional descriptors that characterize the identity of the pole type

label.name: Maintenance Request
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around the upkeep of common city-systems or facilities. These are typically reported by city employees

label.name: Accident Cleanup
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around clearing the wreckage resulting from a vehicle accident

label.name: Debris Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around reporting and/or requesting clean up for trash or miscellaneous debris in locations where it does not belong

label.name: Parking Meter Issue
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around problems with municipality parking meters

label.name: Access Request
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around either being locked out of a location or locked in

label.name: Container Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around complaints about neglected garbage containers in public places or the need for placement of these containers

label.name: Administration
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around requiring some sort of help or consultation with a particular individual. Other broad categorization of "administrative help" fall into this label pair as well

label.name: Streetlight Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around outages or issues with streetlights, other than the streetlight falling

label.name: Building Structural Integrity
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around citizen concerns for the structural integrity of a building

label.name: Tree Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around issues with a tree other than if the tree has fallen or the tree is causing a hazard in conjunction with wires

label.name: Animal Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around the nuisance posed by and/or well-being of stray animals (not necessarily animals types that are typically kept as pets)

label.name: Labor Request
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around requesting city employees to complete some task that is not related to the maintenance of city systems

label.name: Pests
label.definition: Description whose central theme is related to insects and/or rodent infestations, reports, or complaints. These are typically reported in the context of city facilities

label.name: Irrigation Issue
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around irrigation systems such as sprinklers. Typically regarding the system leaking or causing damage to other assets.

label.name: System Test
label.definition: Description whose explicit purpose is to test the system

label.name: Service Request
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around work a citizen is asking the municipality to perform on municipality infrastructure that is not related to the maintenance of existing systems and that is not explicitly related to another municipality asset

label.name: Board Up
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around requiring boarding up of a property or portion of a property due to either damage or dereliction

label.name: Police
label.definition: Description whose central theme is related to situations that would most likely require police intervention

label.name: Illicit Discharge
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around the leaking or dumping of substances into the water or drainage systems of a city

label.name: Barricade Request
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around the requirement of barricade installment or removal

label.name: Easement Maintenance
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around landscaping that needs to be completed on public property

label.name: Flooding
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around cases of large amounts of water gathering in a location that cannot be directly traced back to weather related causes or the Water asset at the location

label.name: Graffiti
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around defacement of public property, typically with paint.

label.name: Scooters
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around the public scooter system in a city

label.name: Homeless Encampment
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around the congregation of homeless individuals in a particular location for a prolonged period of time

label.name: Tree in Wires
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around reports of trees posing a potential threat due to interaction with wires or power lines

label.name: Odor Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around citizens reporting smells that cannot be assigned as Gas, Hazmat, Stormwater, Sewer or Water issues.

label.name: Billing
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around incorrect billing for an asset, billing questions, or bill payment.

label.name: Utility Locate
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around requesting a service to help find the utility locations in an area in order to perform construction or maintenance to an asset

label.name: Service Disconnected
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around a lack of gas service for reasons related to bill payment or lack thereof

label.name: Turn On Request
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around a request to reinstate the gas asset service after a period when it has been off by request

label.name: Service Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around work having been done on the gas asset that was either unsatisfactory, incomplete, or caused other damage to the either the gas asset or another asset

label.name: Question
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around citizens requesting information about the gas asset

label.name: Shutoff Request
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around a citizen requesting temporary or permanent discontinuation of the gas asset

label.name: Gas Asset Issue
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around problems with a specific gas asset other than a leak, a service interruption, or a request to turn the gas off

label.name: Service Interruption
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around a gas outage where the citizen does not have service for any reason other than a billing issue

label.name: Gas Leak
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around leaking of gas

label.name: High Pressure
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around the pressure in the water system being above typical levels

label.name: Meter Issue
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around water asset issues occurring at the water meter

label.name: Low Pressure
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around the pressure in the water system being below typical levels

label.name: Frozen Pipes
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around issues with frozen pipes

label.name: Question
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around citizens requesting information about the water asset

label.name: Fire Hydrant Issue
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around water leaking from a fire hydrant

label.name: Service Disconnected
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around a lack of water service for reasons related to bill payment or lack thereof

label.name: Water Leaking
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around leaking of the water asset, typically inside the home or business

label.name: High Usage
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around instances where a citizen's water usage is far above normal levels

label.name: Turn On Request
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around a request to reinstate the water asset service after a period when it has been off by request

label.name: Service Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around work having been done on the water asset that was either unsatisfactory, incomplete, or caused other damage to either the water asset or another asset

label.name: Water Asset Issue
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around usability (with the exception of an outage) of, damage to or displacement of a water asset other than a water meter

label.name: Service Request
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around work a citizen is asking the city to perform that related to the water asset

label.name: Frozen Meter
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around issues with frozen meters

label.name: Odor Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around citizens reporting smells that are indicative of issues with the water asset or at the location of a water asset

label.name: Service Interruption
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around a lack of the water service for any reason other than lack of bill payment

label.name: Water Waste
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around violation of water shortage regulations

label.name: Water Quality
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around the quality of water including reports of odor, color, taste and sediment content

label.name: Shutoff Request
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around a citizen requesting temporary or permanent discontinuation of the water asset

label.name: Service Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around work related to traffic that was either unsatisfactory, incomplete, or caused other damage to the asset or another asset

label.name: Downed Streetlight
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around streetlights that have fallen down. Object must be identifiable as a streetlight to fall into this category; explicit identification or strong contextual queues are preferred

label.name: Signal Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around issues with traffic lights and other traffic signaling objects such as pedestrian crosswalk lights

label.name: Streetlight Request
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around the request for lighting in a new location

label.name: Sign Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around problems with some sort of signage

label.name: Sign Request
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around requests for some sort of signage that do not require a traffic study to determine the necessity of the sign

label.name: Traffic Study
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around observations about the current environment and flow of traffic in a location. Typically these are cases that will require the city to come out and make an observation of the environment before taking action to resolve the issue.

label.name: Question
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around citizens requesting information about traffic

label.name: Service Request
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around work a citizen is asking the city to perform that related to the stormwater asset

label.name: Drain Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around problems with drains in a public place that do not include immediate blockage

label.name: Ditch Complaint
label.definition: Descriptions whose central theme is around citizens calling in with complaints about ditches.

label.name: Erosion
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around the washing away or absence of topsoil or a similar material due to weather patterns and the stormwater systems

label.name: Flooding
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around cases of large amounts of water gathering in a location that can be directly traced back to weather-related causes

label.name: Odor Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around citizens reporting smells that are indicative of issues with the stormwater asset or at the location of a stormwater asset

label.name: Question
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around citizens requesting information about the stormwater asset

label.name: Drainage Violation
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around water draining onto the citizen's property or another referenced property due to the actions of another party or improper infrastructure

label.name: Sump Pump Issue
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around issues with sump pumps themselves

label.name: Drain Blockage
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around a lack of proper drainage in a public place that is related to the stormwater systems

label.name: Service Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around work having been done on the stormwater asset that was either unsatisfactory, incomplete, or caused other damage to either the stormwater asset or another asset

label.name: Manhole Complaint
label.definition: Description whose central theme is around issues with manholes associated with the stormwater systems. Excludes sewer related manholes
